mapper.insert: insert into `user_dept`(`user_id`, `dept_id`, `deleted`) values (#{userId}, #{deptId}, #{deleted}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_id = #{userId}, dept_id = #{deptId}, deleted = #{deleted}
mapper.update: insert into `user_dept`(`user_id`, `dept_id`, `deleted`) values (#{userId}, #{deptId}, #{deleted}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_id = #{userId}, dept_id = #{deptId}, deleted = #{deleted}
mapper.select: select d.`dept_id`, d.`dept_name`, d.`dept_state`, d.`sort_value`, d.`create_time`, d.`edit_time`, d.`upper_id`, d.`deleted` from `user_dept` as ud left join `dept` as d on ud.dept_id = d.dept_id where ud.user_id = #{userId} and ud.deleted = 0 and d.deleted = 0 limit 1
